application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Conditions 6 (Professional management of engineering works), 7 (Flood Risk Assessment/Sustainable Drainage Systems Strategy), 10 (Contamination - preliminary risk assessment report and proposed site investigations) and 11 (Contamination - Quantitative risk assessment and remediation strategy) of planning permission PP/24/03246 (Demolition of two storey side and rear extension; replacement of second floor; refurbishment of property; erection of two storey rear extension; construction of single storey basement with 3no. lightwells; alterations to facades, external landscaping and associated works)
